articles.title: 2021 Hero Destini 125 Platinum Edition – Key Features, Price - India Car News
articles.description: Hero MotoCorp has rolled out a special edition of the Destini 125 scooter in the country. Called 2021 Hero Destini 125 Platinum Edition, the new model has been priced at Rs 72,050 (ex-showroom, Delhi). The scooter’s Platinum Edition has received enhanced aest…
